meta.name: Jira Ticket Creation from Google Forms with Sheet Updates and Email Notifications

parameters.content:
## Required


• Google Form + response sheet
• Jira Cloud project (API email + API token)
• Gmail credential

nodes.name: Update the Google sheet with tickets information

parameters.subject: You just received a new ticket

parameters.content:
## 1) Trigger and Normalize 

Trigger: New row added to Google Sheets

Data Processing:
- Clean and normalize all fields
- summary: Single-spaced, trimmed text
- description: Preserve paragraphs (trimmed)
- reporter_email: Extract from "email address" or "Email" fields
- Handle optional fields (like attachments)

Best Practices:
Perform all data cleaning here to avoid reprocessing later

## 2) Create Jira ticket

Action: Call Jira API to create ticket

Key Parameters:
- Project: 
- Type: Story
- Priority: Mapped to Jira IDs (1-5)
- Description: Standardized format

Outputs:
- Ticket key (e.g., TES-503)
- Ticket URL
- Creation status

Tips
Priority: Map with the ID

## 3) Update the sheet and send Gmail notification
Action: Update source row with Jira information

Updated Fields:
- jira_key: Ticket reference
- jira_url: Ticket link
- status: "Created"
- created_at: Creation timestamp

Matching Mechanism:
- Use "Horodateur" column for row matching


Action: Send confirmation email

Recipients: The person who needs to get the notification + eventually the requester

Content:
- Ticket reference and link
- Title and priority
- Creation status
- Requester information

main.node: Update the Google sheet with tickets information
